scenario_text.value:
I’m sorry, Saki... I’m sorry... All of it was
my fault...

(Was I the only one to blame? Did Saki make
any mistakes...?)

I couldn’t save her... I let go of her
hand...

(Saki’s the one who let go. That’s what
made her death inevitable.)
No... No, no, no! Why couldn’t I save her?!
Why am I thinking such cowardly thoughts?!

(Because...I’m angry. Angry at myself for not
saving her. And at her, for going on her own.)

(That’s why I was so happy when she came
back, but...why’d she have to leave again?!)
Saki...what should I have done for you?
How could I have kept you alive? I...

(What... What can I do to bring Saki back?
How can I get to where she is?)
